# Miscellaneous course policies

## Class averages, exam averages, etc are not reported

I don't report mean, max, mean, sd, distribution etc of exams or the overall class grade.

## Office hours are not held after exams

Afters exams I am generally not free for office hours / meeting. I also don't hold office hours during finals week.

##  Drops always come first - personal, sports etc
